title: Home Office Politics | Make Money Save Money in 2021

items.title: How Improved Creative Thinking Leads to Making More Money
items.summary: I have been in the business of creative communications for more than 30 years. I started as an ad copywriter and now wear many different creative hats: I became an account manager, a layout artist, a creative director, a media planner, and a marketing communications consultant. I have learned how being more creative can lead to more opportunities to make money. So, whenever there’s an opportunity to improve my creativity and learn from new experiences, count me in. You might say that I am a creative person, and creative thinking comes naturally to me. But is creativity confined to people like me? What about people who are don't consider themselves "creative" or artists? Can’t they be creative too? This is not an idle question that just stops at self-reflection. We (you and me) need to understand our creative gifts and the way that the creative process works, because improved creative thinking can lead us to making more money. (share with the world) Many people think that creativity is something you have or you don’t. Thinking that only a certain people are creative is a very simplistic view that will lead you to believe that you are not creative and don’t…

items.title: High-level Side Hustle Assessment Grades
items.summary: The Home Office Politics side hustle assessment is intended to help you as an entrepreneur to understand your preparedness to start--or continue with--a side hustle. Please complete (or retake) the high-level side hustle assessment for entrepreneurs if you have not already. The results of this evaluation is intended for informational purposes only; but knowledge is power. Instructions: After you completed the 60-second high-level side hustle assessment for entrepreneurs, you were redirected to this page and to the correct section that applies to your own evaluation. We also emailed a copy of your score to your valid email address that you provided at the end of the survey. You can reference that email if necessary to find your score again. You can also refresh the page and you will be re-directed back to your score section. These grades range from 0-31, zero being low and 31 being high. An excellent grade are ranges from 23-31 (maximum). 16-22 10-15 3-9 0-2 Thank you for taking the high-level side hustle assessment for entrepreneurs. You are on the right path toward fulfilling your dreams of being an entrepreneur, starting and running your own business.  Contact us today for advice about how you can keep…

items.title: Make Money
items.summary: This is a static page focused around the pillar "make money", and will be a manually-written page that highlights all the topic clusters and articles about making money.

items.title: About Us
items.summary: We've been working online since 2002. We begun doing technical support and design services for an early ecommerce platform. Our first full-time work from home gig started in 2011 and we've been doing this ever since. We now manage five brands with a few dozen contractors. We've always thought we should chronicle our lives and experience working from home. We've had challenges, fun times, and love the puns all along the way. Follow us and we'll introduce you to how you can work from home on your own side hustle, time gig working for someone else, and save money too.

items.title: About You
items.summary: We want to know more about you. Tell us what you want to achieve? Do you want to make more more money, save money, start a side hustle or get side gig? What challenges are you experiencing? What would help you achieve these goals? If we can help, we will get back to you with more information and resources. Loading…

items.title: Contact Us
items.summary: Send us an email by completing the form below. No spam please. Loading…

items.title: Terms, Conditions, Privacy, etc.
items.summary: The terms "us", "we", "HOP", etc. represent Home Office Politics. The terms "you", "viewer", "visitor", etc. represent you. Our service, tools and information is provided as-is with no warranty. We will do our best to provide you great information and tools and keep them available as much as possible. We reserve the right to limit access to our resources at our sole discretion.  We reserve the right to use the content, data and tools at our disposal for our advantage as long as it is good and legal. Data provided to us via form submissions is used for customer service, assessment, and marketing purposes. The content on HomeOfficePolitics.com may contain affiliate links, meaning we receive payment if you decide to make a purchase or sign up through our links, at no cost to you. Please use our links to help support everything we are trying to do for you and our community.

items.title: Save Money
items.summary: Manual pillar page about the pillar keyword ... e.g Save Money. Includes a manually updated or written description of the cluster topics and articles contained in the "save money" pillar.

items.title: Write for Us
items.summary: We love working with other authors and people experienced with making money, saving money, working from home, remote jobs, side hustles, side gigs and personal finance. Please complete this form if you have something you would like to contribute or if you want to work together. We love reciprocating links, articles, etc. Fees may apply. Don't get overwhelmed here, this is more common sense and is easy if you write quality content. Submit your content. Thank you.
